Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

Stereo Delay Filter

Discussion

This filter provides a true stereo delay with separate delay times for the left and right channels.

Preferences:

"Stereo Delay TimeL": Left delay amount. Range: 0.01 to 2000.0 milliseconds.

"Stereo Delay TimeR": Right delay amount. Range: 0.01 to 2000.0 milliseconds.

"Stereo Delay": Feedback Regeneration of signal. Range: 0.00 to 1.0 %.

"Stereo Delay Mix": Mix of delay signal. Range: 0.00 (original - dry) to 1.0 % (full delay - wet).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Mono Delay Filter
